img.alt: Dress Up Like a Staff Member

span.span: Parents, please check out our updated
! This will take effect on April 6th, 2020 in the event that we are directed by the Governor not to return to school. Check it out!

br.span: We know it's hard to imagine, but this too shall pass...and next year, your students will need supplies! 1st Day Supply Kits are available now (thanks PTO!).

div.a: Bellbrook-Sugarcreek Board of Education Approves Phase III and Phase IV Budget Cuts

span.span: The Bellbrook-Sugarcreek Board of Education voted during the February 13 regular board meeting to unanimously approve necessary
due to the district’s long-term financial situation.

br.span: Representative Cupp visited the district to speak to residents about the future of school funding in Ohio. Please click here for more information or to watch the presentation.
If you're interested in sports updates, click here!

span.div: State report cards are out. Want to see how we did?
